SEARCH
Package main.models

Class Borrow

java.lang.Object
main.models.Borrow
public class Borrow extends Object
Represents an instance of book borrowing. Contains information about the user who borrowed the book, the book itself, and the start and end dates of the borrowing period.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Borrow(User user, Book book, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
    Constructs a new Borrow instance with the specified user, book, start date, and end date.
